name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, ask Haiku Reader to read me a haiku”
”Alexa, tell Haiku Reader to read me something”
”Alexa, tell Haiku Reader to read a poem”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des:
Haiku Reader is a simple skill that reads out common and random haikus to the user. The purpose of this is to receive some poems.
Some of the things you can say:
"Ask Haiku Reader to read me something"
"Tell Haiku Reader to read a verse"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
